company.name: GTM Holdings S.A.
company.description:
GTM Caldic is a distributor of specialties, ingredients and chemical products. As part of Caldic, the company is positioned in the top three global players in specialty ingredients and chemicals.

In addition, the company offers logistics services and innovative solutions to serve customers in markets such as Agribusiness, Mining, Cosmetics, Rubber, Oil and Gas, Inks, Lubricants and Flexography.

With more than 2,300 collaborators globally, GTM Caldic operates in 11 Latin American countries - Brazil, Mexico, Guatemala, El Salvador, Honduras, Nicaragua, Costa Rica, Panama, Colombia, Ecuador and Peru.
